item.title: Swingin the tram
item.dc:creator: sebastian
item.description: It seems I missed one of the best parts of this years Amsterdam Lindy Exchange. After the farewell party some dancers made a tram bouncing to the city centre … Using one of the dancers mobilephone the driver played some swing music. Then the party just went on … Swingouts around the stations ðŸ™‚ What […]
